original: Fighters are fast and nimble and can do many jobs. Everything from fighting for air superiority, protect your bombers and intercept the enemies bombers.
translation: 战斗机灵敏轻巧，可完成多种任务。包括夺取制空权、为轰炸机护航及截击敌方轰炸机。

original: Fighters are fast and nimble and can do many jobs. Everything from fighting for air superiority, protect your bombers and intercept the enemies bombers.
translation: 战斗机灵敏轻巧，可完成多种任务。包括夺取制空权、为轰炸机护航及截击敌方轰炸机。

original: Fighters are fast and nimble and can do many jobs. Everything from fighting for air superiority, protect your bombers and intercept the enemies bombers.
translation: 战斗机灵敏轻巧，可完成多种任务。包括夺取制空权、为轰炸机护航及截击敌方轰炸机。

original: Close Air Support planes are designed to provide support in land combat.
translation: 近距支援机为地面战斗提供支援。

original: Close Air Support planes are designed to provide support in land combat.
translation: 近距支援机为地面战斗提供支援。

original: Naval Bombers are able to perform attacks against enemy ships.
translation: 海军轰炸机可攻击敌方舰船。

original: Naval Bombers are able to perform attacks against enemy ships.
translation: 海军轰炸机可攻击敌方舰船。

original: Tactical Bombers are smaller fast bombers that can help out ground troops and bomb enemy buildings.
translation: 战术轰炸机较其他轰炸机更小巧轻快，可协助地面部队并轰炸敌方建筑。

original: Tactical Bombers are smaller fast bombers that can help out ground troops and bomb enemy buildings.
translation: 战术轰炸机较其他轰炸机更小巧轻快，可协助地面部队并轰炸敌方建筑。

original: Heavy Fighters have long range and powerful weapons. They are good both for protecting bombers at range and intercept enemy bombers. Their lower agility however means that they will struggle against regular fighters.
translation: 重型战斗机的航程长、武器强力。既适合在航程内为轰炸机护航，亦适于截击敌方轰炸机。但其低灵敏度使得它们面对普通战斗机时难以抗衡。

original: Strategic Bombers attack enemy buildings and infrastructure, starving them of precious industry.
translation: 战略轰炸机攻击敌方建筑及基础设施，毁坏其珍贵的工业。

original: Strategic Bombers attack enemy buildings and infrastructure, starving them of precious industry.
translation: 战略轰炸机攻击敌方建筑及基础设施，毁坏其珍贵的工业。
投送空降部队至其目标地点。

original: Short range interceptor powered by a chemical rocket engine.
translation: 由化学火箭引擎驱动的短程截击机。

original: Short range manned bomb powered by a chemical rocket engine.
translation: 化学火箭引擎推进的短距离载人炸弹。

original: While fighter aircraft underwent many changes through the Great War, and since, the bi-plane design is becoming obsolete. We must begin to translate civilian technological advances into military applications.
translation: 战斗机在大战期间经历了许多变化，战后，双翼设计被抛弃。我们必须将民用科技进展应用于军事。

original: Light airframes have been revolutionized with the introduction of radial engines, monoplane designs and all metal skin construction. This design is our attempt at creating our first modern fighter plane.
translation: 随着星形发动机、单翼设计及全金属外壳的引入，轻机身亦发生了革命。此种设计为我们制造首架现代战斗机的尝试。

original: The pace of fighter advancements is astounding, and as such, we must continue to incorporate the technology as well as improve upon existing concepts. Our new fighter design must be capable of high speed, high performance at altitude and the best range possible. Additionally, it must be very well armed.
translation: 战斗机取得了令人震惊的进展，同样，我们要继续整合技术及既有理念上的革新。我们的新战机设计需要同时满足高速、高海拔高性能及尽可能长的航程。此外，还需要全副武装。

original: While our previous generations of fighter plane have proven worthy, any advantage gained by a better design should be taken. This aircraft will be the pinnacle platform of piston-engined fighter that will have excellent power, high agility, deadly weaponry and good range.
translation: 前代战机证明了其价值，任何更佳的设计所带来的进步都不可忽视。该种飞机将成为活塞发动机驱动战机的顶峰，拥有卓越动力、高度灵活、致命武装及良好航程。

original: Our bomber force needs escort protection from enemy fighters all the way to their targets and back. In order to provide this escort, we must design fighter aircraft with bomber range. Out of necessity these aircraft are larger, slower and less agile than light fighters, though they can carry significant armament.
translation: 我们的轰炸机任务往返时需要护航保护，以免遭遇敌军战机。为提供护航，我们必须开发一款有着轰炸机航程的战斗机。无可避免，这种飞机较轻型战斗机更加庞大、缓慢、灵敏度更差，但能够携带相当数量的武装。

original: The war has taught us that our heavy fighter design is vulnerable to more nimble fighters, but quite good at the interception of enemy bombers due to heavy armament. This next design will focus on increased attack capability against enemy aircraft and even ground targets. Its speed and range will be improved as well.
translation: 战争教会了我们，我们现有的重型战机在轻巧的战机面前极其脆弱，但因为它的重武装，它在拦截敌方轰炸机时表现甚好。这次改良将注重于提升对敌机甚至地面目标的攻击能力。其航速和航程亦将提升。

original: Though our heavy fighter force has shown adeptness in various roles, we must consider a new design that will enhance its ability relative to enemy fighters, as well as allow it to continue intercepting increasingly faster and better defended enemy bombers.
translation: 虽然我们的重型战机熟练于执行各种任务，我们必须考虑一种新的设计，以提升其相对敌方战机的灵敏性，同时让其继续拦截越来越快、防御越来越严密的敌方轰炸机。

original: Experiences from the Great War and studies since show that bombing the enemy's military targets and major cities will win the next war. At the very least, we must have a bomber capable of delivering such destruction. It will need to fly high and at good speed, and it must carry a large payload. This will require a large airframe with multiple engines. It will also have some defensive capability.
translation: 大战得来的经验及之后的研究均表明，轰炸敌方军事目标及其主要城市将赢得下次战争。至少，我们需要一款能执行此种任务的轰炸机。其需要飞行高度高、航速快，并需要携带大量载荷。此种设计要求大型机身、多引擎。同时还需具有一定的防御能力。

original: Bombing has proven effective at reducing the enemy's capacity to wage war. More defensive weaponry and increased speed will allow a new design to avoid destruction, while increasing the payload and range will make it more effective.
translation: 轰炸被证明能有效遏制敌方进行战争的能力。更多防御武器及更高的航速可使新型轰炸机免于坠毁，同时增加其载荷及航程，使得其更加有效。

original: To avoid losses to enemy fighters and ground fire, our next design will fly at great altitude. It will be larger to carry both an enormous payload and more fuel, to increase range.
translation: 为避免轰炸机损失于敌方战机及地面火力，下一代飞机将在极高海拔飞行。同时机身将更大以承载庞大的载荷及更多的燃料，提升航程。
喷气式战略轰炸机 I型
喷气式战略轰炸机 I型

original: Multiple jet engines allow new designs unprecedented speed while maintaining a large payload and long range. These planes are built for a new era of weapons of mass destruction.
translation: 多孔喷射引擎使得新型飞机拥有史无前例的航速，同时能保持携带大量载荷及长航程。此种飞机为大型杀伤武器的新时代而建造。

original: It is widely believed that the next war will be won entirely by bombing the enemy to extinction. It is imperative that we begin designing our own bomber plane that is capable of carrying heavy payloads at adequate speed.
translation: 许多人相信，下次战争中将通过将敌军炸成渣渣而大获全胜。我们有必要设计自己的轰炸机，能够在适当速度下携带重载荷飞行。

original: Medium bombers need to be versatile and fast, capable of fulfilling a range of roles. A twin-engined design, remaining relatively light, can continue to be of use for many years to come.
translation: 中型轰炸机的定位是多面手，能快速、可靠地完成一系列任务。双引擎、相对轻的重量，可继续使用多年。

original: Heavier designs of tactical bombers can extend range, payload and speed while maintaining the planes' capacity to perform a wide variety of missions.
translation: 更重的战术轰炸机能增加其航程、载荷及航速，同时保持飞机执行多重任务的能力。

original: Taking a page from the advancements in fighter planes, unconventional materials and shapes can make new designs some of the fastest and best performing twin-engine planes ever built.
translation: 从战斗机发展中得到一大堆好处，非传统材料及造型可使新型飞机成为目前航速最快、表现最好的双引擎飞机。

original: §LPlanes used to transport troops on paradrop missions.§!
translation: §L用于执行空降任务时运输部队的机种。§!

original: Naval aviation will be vital in the coming decade to confront new developments in naval warfare, such as the increased importance of submarines. Seaplanes with capacity to work as dive bombers and recon vehicles will be of use.
translation: 海军飞机对于在接下来的十年中面对海军武器，比如潜艇地位的提升等的新发展至关重要。拥有作为俯冲轰炸机及侦察机的水上飞机将被使用。

original: New engine technology and aerodynamically refined designs will boost the speed and diving attack capability of naval planes significantly.
translation: 新的引擎技术及空气动力学改进的设计将大大提升海军飞机的速度及俯冲轰炸能力。

original: All-metal designs and powerful airbrakes allow for more complex naval aeronautics. The planes of the future will demand a larger crew to operate these advanced systems, however.
translation: 全金属设计及强力的减速板使得海军飞行学更加复杂。但未来的飞机将需要更多乘员以操作这些复杂的系统。

original: Our CAS doctrine requires an aircraft capable of precision surface attack. While these aircraft carry a lesser payload compared to our larger Tactical Bombers, they are capable of attacking and destroying small targets of opportunity through strafing and dive bombing.
translation: 我们的密接支援理论学说要求一款可进行精确范围攻击的飞行器。此种飞机的可用载荷较大型的战略轰炸机要小，可在低空扫射及俯冲轰炸时伺机攻击摧毁小型目标。

original: Early war experiences have shown that increased speed, armor and maneuverability are necessary for CAS aircraft survivability against enemy fighters and ground fire. This next generation of ground attack aircraft will also utilize larger bombs, cannons and machineguns to inflict greater damage to their targets.
translation: 早期战争经验告诉我们，近距支援机在敌机及地面火力的攻击下的存活率取决于更快的航速、更好的装甲及更佳的机动性。此种次世代地面攻击机亦将使用更大的炸弹、火炮及机枪以对其目标造成更大伤害。

original: The ever increasing capability of target AA and enemy interceptors require further evolution of our CAS aircraft. The new design incorporates increased engine power, airframe improvements for increased diving capability and protection, as well as even greater payloads.
translation: 目标的防空能力及敌军截击机前所未有的进展使得近距支援机需要进一步发展。新款设计同时拥有增大的引擎动力、改进机身以增强俯冲能力及防护能力，还有更大的载荷。

original: Previous increases in speed pale in comparison to the introduction of the first jet fighters. While we have yet to learn how to best construct planes for these engines, regular fighter planes cannot compete.
translation: 现有的速度提升都在第一款喷气战斗机引入后相形见绌。虽然我们还未学会如何将此种引擎的飞机造得最好，但普通飞机已难望其项背。

original: New swept wing designs and lighter material choices will allow us to extend the range and speed of the revolutionary jet fighters even further.
translation: 新的掠翼设计及更轻的材料选择将使得我们进一步扩展革命性的喷气式战斗机的航程及速度。
喷气式战术轰炸机 I型
喷气式战术轰炸机 I型

original: The advent of jet fighters necessitates bombers that can outrun or at least match their speed. First-generation medium bombers and bomber-fighters equipped with jet engines will fill this role.
translation: 喷气式战斗机的出现迫使轰炸机的航速需要赶超或至少与之匹敌。第一代装备喷气式引擎的中型轰炸机及战斗轰炸机将填补这一角色。
喷气式战术轰炸机 II型
喷气式战术轰炸机 II型

original: Not content with speed, future jet bombers will set altitude and range records, delivering payloads and performing reconnaissance on intercontinental missions.
translation: 由于航速不足，新一代喷气式轰炸机更加注重海拔及航程，携带更多载荷，并在洲际任务中进行侦查。
舰载海军轰炸机 I型
舰载海军轰炸机 I型

original: An early naval bomber modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种早期海军轰炸机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。
舰载海军轰炸机 II型
舰载海军轰炸机 II型

original: An improved naval bomber modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种改良海军轰炸机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。
舰载海军轰炸机 III型
舰载海军轰炸机 III型

original: An advanced naval bomber modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种先进海军轰炸机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。
舰载近距支援机 I型
舰载近距支援机 I型

original: An early close air support plane modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种早期近距支援机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。
舰载近距支援机 II型
舰载近距支援机 II型

original: An improved close air support plane modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种改良近距支援机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。
舰载近距支援机 III型

original: An advanced close air support plane modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种先进近距支援机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。

original: An early fighter modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种早期战斗机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。

original: An early fighter modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种早期战斗机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。

original: An improved fighter modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种改良战斗机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。

original: An advanced fighter modified to launch from and land on aircraft carriers.
translation: 一种先进战斗机，改造为可从航母起飞降落。

original: Short range experimental interceptor powered by an unreliable chemical rocket engine.
translation: 短程实验截击机，以不可靠的化学火箭引擎推进。

original: Short range interceptor powered by a slightly more reliable chemical rocket engine.
translation: 短程截击机，以更可靠的化学火箭引擎推进。

original: We have finally worked out most of the problems with the rocket engines and the Rocket Interceptor is now a solid close range defender of facilities.
translation: 我们终于解决了火箭引擎的大多数问题，现在火箭截击机是一款设施中可靠的近程防御武器。

original: The Yokosuka MXY-7 Ohka was a purpose-built, rocket powered human-guided anti-shipping kamikaze attack plane employed by Japan towards the end of World War II.
translation: 横须贺MXY7 樱花是日本在二战将结束前投入使用的一款由火箭驱动的人工制导反舰神风攻击机。

original: The experimental flying wing design is the future of stealth bombing planes. Combined with intercontintal range, this bomber can strike even our most distant enemies before they are able to respond.
translation: 根据经验设计的飞翼是隐形轰炸机的未来。结合洲际航程，此种轰炸机甚至可在敌人反应前打击最远的敌人。
布里斯托 布伦海姆
布里斯托 英俊战士
汉德利-佩齐 哈利法克斯

亨德里·佩奇哈利法克斯式
亨德里·佩奇哈利法克斯式
